Judul: Concise Reviews and Hypotheses in food Science
Abstrak: Atomic force microscopy (AFM) provides a method for detecting nanoscale structural information. first, this review explains the fundamentals to AFM, including principle, manipulation, and analysis. applications of AFM are then reported in food science and technologyresearch, including cualitative macromolecule and polymer imaging, complicated or quantitative structure analysis, molecular interaction, molecular manipulation, surface topography, and nanofood chracterization.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Daryl B. Lund, Carl A. Batt, Solke Bruin, Eric Dickinson, Joseph Miltz
Kata Kunci: atomic force microscopy (AFM), food science, macromolecule, microstructur, nanotechnology
